title: Can anyone confirm this bug?
body:
Hi everyone,

I was playing a match where there was an enemy Lux- but every time she cast her E, (Lucent Singularity) it would be invisible...
Can anyone confirm this bug? It was infuriating chasing the Lux with 10 hp, and getting slowed by an invisible E...

Cheers,
-Anserem

replies.body: The normal spell is transparent enough, it needs a clearer border, like Xerath's spells.
I have had it happen to me a couple times, but i restarted my internet and lol, and the bug disappeared.
